an5.40:1: "Himavantaṁ, bhikkhave, pabbatarājaṁ nissāya mahāsālā pañcahi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhanti. Katamāhi pañcahi? Sākhāpattapalāsena vaḍḍhanti; tacena vaḍḍhanti; papaṭikāya vaḍḍhanti; pheggunā vaḍḍhanti; sārena vaḍḍhanti. Himavantaṁ, bhikkhave, pabbatarājaṁ nissāya mahāsālā imāhi pañcahi vaḍḍhīhi vaḍḍhanti.
an5.40:2: Yathā hi pabbato selo,araññasmiṁ brahāvane;Taṁ rukkhā upanissāya,vaḍḍhante te vanappatī.
an5.40:3: Tatheva sīlasampannaṁ,Saddhaṁ kulaputtaṁ imaṁ;Upanissāya vaḍḍhanti,Puttadārā ca bandhavā;Amaccā ñātisaṅghā ca,Ye cassa anujīvino.
an5.40:4: Tyassa sīlavato sīlaṁ,cāgaṁ sucaritāni ca;Passamānānukubbanti,ye bhavanti vicakkhaṇā.
an5.40:5: Idha dhammaṁ caritvāna,maggaṁ sugatigāminaṁ;Nandino devalokasmiṁ,modanti kāmakāmino"ti.
an5.40:6: Sumanā cundī uggaho,sīho dānānisaṁsako;Kālabhojanasaddhā ca,puttasālehi te dasāti.
